scripts.logs:start: mkdir -p .logs && nohup bunx wrangler tail --format=pretty > .logs/worker-tail.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .logs/tail.pid && echo 'tail PID:' $(cat .logs/tail.pid)
scripts.logs:stop: test -f .logs/tail.pid && kill $(cat .logs/tail.pid) && rm -f .logs/tail.pid || echo 'no tail pid'
scripts.logs:status: test -f .logs/tail.pid && ps -p $(cat .logs/tail.pid) -o pid,etime,cmd || echo 'no tail pid'
